Risk Description: Data quality baseline unknown - can't establish GOALS Soundness targets
Mitigation Plan: Deploy Great Expectations for 10 critical tables, run quality profiling for 1 week to establish baseline
Outcome: Baseline established: 92% accuracy, 89% completeness, identified 3 critical quality issues requiring fixes
Lessons Learned: Always establish quality baseline Week 1 - can't improve what you don't measure

Risk Description: Dashboard adoption low - team not using observability tools
Mitigation Plan: Mandatory dashboard review in daily standups, train team on Grafana, create personalized views for each role
Outcome: Adoption increased from 30% â†’ 85%, early detection of 2 issues prevented escalation
Lessons Learned: Build observability into team rituals - don't make it optional

Risk Description: CDC complexity for legacy EHR - vendor API limitations
Mitigation Plan: Use Debezium database-level CDC instead of API-based, required DBA support for replication setup
Outcome: CDC operational but 2 days late, <30s freshness achieved, stable for 8 weeks
Lessons Learned: Legacy systems need CDC at database level - APIs too slow/unreliable

Risk Description: Business glossary incomplete - domain experts too busy
Mitigation Plan: Dedicated 2-hour workshop sessions with each domain expert, incentivize participation with executive visibility
Outcome: 50 terms defined with expert validation, entity resolution improved from 68% â†’ 82%
Lessons Learned: Engage domain experts early with time-boxed commitments - don't rely on async

Risk Description: Vector DB performance tuning - initial latency 120ms (target <50ms)
Mitigation Plan: Optimize index parameters (m=16, ef_construction=200), reduce embedding dimensions 1536 â†’ 768, add caching
Outcome: Latency reduced to 42ms p95, throughput 10K/sec, 99.9% uptime maintained
Lessons Learned: Performance tune early - don't wait until production

Mitigation Plan: Add Cohere reranking stage, tune retrieval top_k from 5 â†’ 10, implement hybrid search (BM25 + vector)
Outcome: Accuracy improved 72% â†’ 85%, hybrid search +18% precision, NDCG@5: 0.71 â†’ 0.84
Lessons Learned: Multi-stage RAG essential for production quality - single-stage insufficient

Risk Description: Agent accuracy plateau - not improving Week 6 â†’ Week 7
Mitigation Plan: Analyze failure cases, improve prompt engineering, add few-shot examples for edge cases, semantic caching
Outcome: Accuracy improved 85% â†’ 87% with semantic caching (62% hit rate), reduced latency 20%
Lessons Learned: Semantic caching improves both accuracy and latency - implement early

Risk Description: ABAC policy complexity - 25 policies created vs 15 planned
Mitigation Plan: Simplify policies by consolidating similar rules, create policy templates for common patterns, document decisions
Outcome: Reduced to 15 policies covering all use cases, <8ms evaluation maintained, easier to audit
Lessons Learned: Start simple with ABAC - add complexity only when needed

Risk Description: Human review queue overwhelming - 22% escalation rate (target <15%)
Mitigation Plan: Adjust confidence threshold 75% â†’ 80%, add auto-approve for low-risk cases (<$100), train 2 additional reviewers
Outcome: Escalation rate reduced 22% â†’ 12%, average review time 3min â†’ 1.5min, queue backlog cleared
Lessons Learned: Tune HITL confidence thresholds empirically - start conservative then optimize

Risk Description: Feedback loop not improving agent - override rate flat
Mitigation Plan: Structure feedback capture (categorical labels), implement weekly retraining pipeline, collect 100+ corrections
Outcome: Override rate decreased 12% â†’ 7.8%, accuracy improved 87% â†’ 89% from 127 corrections
Lessons Learned: Feedback requires structure - free text corrections don't improve models

Risk Description: Multi-agent coordination failures - 8% task failure rate
Mitigation Plan: Implement supervisor agent pattern, add retry logic with exponential backoff, conflict resolution rules
Outcome: Task failure rate 8% â†’ 2%, parallel execution maintained <3s latency, supervision overhead <200ms
Lessons Learned: Multi-agent systems need orchestration - don't rely on direct agent-to-agent communication

Risk Description: UAT findings require rework - 11 medium-priority issues
Mitigation Plan: Prioritize top 5 issues for Week 12 fix, defer 6 lower-priority items to post-launch iteration, retest Week 13
Outcome: 5 critical issues fixed, UAT re-test 94% â†’ 98% success, 6 items in production backlog for Month 2
Lessons Learned: Perfect is enemy of good - ship with known minor issues if core functionality solid
